acme.exams.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • acme.exams.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel, java.io.Serializable

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModel, java.io.Serializable
    Class representing the whole data managed by the ACME-Exams application
